/-- Weighted generalized mean inequality, version for sums over finite sets, with `ℝ≥0∞`-valued
functions and real exponents. -/
theorem rpow_arith_mean_le_arith_mean_rpow (w z : ι → ennreal)
    (hw' : finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (w i) = 1)
    {p : exprℝ} (hp : 1 ≤ p) :
    finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (w i * z i) ^ p ≤
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s
        (w i * z i ^ p) :=
  by
  have hp_pos : 0 < p
  positivity
  have hp_nonneg : 0 ≤ p
  positivity
  have hp_not_nonpos : ¬p ≤ 0 := by simp [hp_pos]
  have hp_not_neg : ¬p < 0 := by simp [hp_nonneg]
  have h_top_iff_rpow_top : ∀ (i : ι) (hi : i ∈ s), w i * z i = «expr⊤» ↔ w i * z i ^ p = «expr⊤» := by
    simp [ENNReal.mul_eq_top, hp_pos, hp_nonneg, hp_not_nonpos, hp_not_neg]
  refine' le_of_top_imp_top_of_to_nnreal_le _ _

    rw [rpow_eq_top_iff, sum_eq_top_iff, sum_eq_top_iff]
    intro h
    simp only [and_false_iff, hp_not_neg, false_or_iff] at h
    rcases h.left with ⟨a, H, ha⟩
    use a, H
    rwa [← h_top_iff_rpow_top a H]
  · -- second, suppose both `(∑ i in s, w i * z i) ^ p ≠ ⊤` and `∑ i in s, (w i * z i ^ p) ≠ ⊤`,
    -- and prove `((∑ i in s, w i * z i) ^ p).to_nnreal ≤ (∑ i in s, (w i * z i ^ p)).to_nnreal`,
    -- by using `nnreal.rpow_arith_mean_le_arith_mean_rpow`.
    intro h_top_rpow_sum _
    -- show hypotheses needed to put the `.to_nnreal` inside the sums.
    have h_top : ∀ a : ι, a ∈ s → w a * z a ≠ «expr⊤» :=
      haveI h_top_sum :
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (w i * z i) ≠
          «expr⊤» :=
        by
        intro h
        rw [h, top_rpow_of_pos hp_pos] at h_top_rpow_sum
        exact h_top_rpow_sum rfl
      fun a ha => (lt_top_of_sum_ne_top h_top_sum ha).ne
    have h_top_rpow : ∀ a : ι, a ∈ s → w a * z a ^ p ≠ «expr⊤» :=
      by
      intro i hi
      specialize h_top i hi
      rwa [ne.def, ← h_top_iff_rpow_top i hi]
    -- put the `.to_nnreal` inside the sums.
    simp_rw [to_nnreal_sum h_top_rpow, ← to_nnreal_rpow, to_nnreal_sum h_top, to_nnreal_mul, ← to_nnreal_rpow]
    -- use corresponding nnreal result
    refine' nnreal.rpow_arith_mean_le_arith_mean_rpow s (fun i => (w i).to_nnreal) (fun i => (z i).to_nnreal) _ hp
    -- verify the hypothesis `∑ i in s, (w i).to_nnreal = 1`, using `∑ i in s, w i = 1` .
    have h_sum_nnreal :
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s (w i) =
        ↑(finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" s
            (w i).to_nnreal) :=
      by
      rw [coe_finset_sum]
      refine' sum_congr rfl fun i hi => (coe_to_nnreal _).symm
      refine' (lt_top_of_sum_ne_top _ hi).ne
      exact hw'.symm ▸ ENNReal.one_ne_top
    rwa [← coe_eq_coe, ← h_sum_nnreal]
#align rpow_arith_mean_le_arith_mean_rpow rpow_arith_mean_le_arith_mean_rpow

exponents. -/
theorem rpow_arith_mean_le_arith_mean2_rpow (w₁ w₂ z₁ z₂ : ennreal) (hw' : w₁ + w₂ = 1) {p : exprℝ} (hp : 1 ≤ p) :

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
theorem rpow_add_rpow_le_add {p : exprℝ} (a b : ennreal) (hp1 : 1 ≤ p) : (a ^ p + b ^ p) ^ (1 / p) ≤ a + b :=
  by
  rw [← @ennreal.le_rpow_one_div_iff _ _ (1 / p) (by simp [lt_of_lt_of_le zero_lt_one hp1])]
  rw [one_div_one_div]

rpow_add_rpow_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
theorem rpow_add_rpow_le {p q : exprℝ} (a b : ennreal) (hp_pos : 0 < p) (hpq : p ≤ q) :
    (a ^ q + b ^ q) ^ (1 / q) ≤ (a ^ p + b ^ p) ^ (1 / p) :=
  by
  have h_rpow : ∀ a : ennreal, a ^ q = (a ^ p) ^ (q / p) := fun a => by
    rw [← ennreal.rpow_mul, _root_.mul_div_cancel' _ hp_pos.ne']
  have h_rpow_add_rpow_le_add : ((a ^ p) ^ (q / p) + (b ^ p) ^ (q / p)) ^ (1 / (q / p)) ≤ a ^ p + b ^ p :=
    by
    refine' rpow_add_rpow_le_add (a ^ p) (b ^ p) _
    rwa [one_le_div hp_pos]
  rw [h_rpow a, h_rpow b, ennreal.le_rpow_one_div_iff hp_pos, ← ennreal.rpow_mul, mul_comm, mul_one_div]
  rwa [one_div_div] at h_rpow_add_rpow_le_add
#align rpow_add_rpow_le rpow_add_rpow_le

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- Unweighted mean inequality, version for two elements of `ℝ≥0∞` and real exponents. -/
theorem rpow_add_le_mul_rpow_add_rpow (z₁ z₂ : ennreal) {p : exprℝ} (hp : 1 ≤ p) :
    (z₁ + z₂) ^ p ≤ 2 ^ (p - 1) * (z₁ ^ p + z₂ ^ p) :=
  by
  rcases eq_or_lt_of_le hp with (rfl | h'p)
  · simp only [rpow_one, sub_self, rpow_zero, one_mul, le_refl]
  convert rpow_arith_mean_le_arith_mean2_rpow (1 / 2) (1 / 2) (2 * z₁) (2 * z₂) (ENNReal.add_halves 1) hp
  · simp [← mul_assoc, ENNReal.inv_mul_cancel two_ne_zero two_ne_top]
  · simp [← mul_assoc, ENNReal.inv_mul_cancel two_ne_zero two_ne_top]
  · have A : p - 1 ≠ 0 := ne_of_gt (sub_pos.2 h'p)
    simp only [mul_rpow_of_nonneg _ _ (zero_le_one.trans hp), rpow_sub _ _ two_ne_zero two_ne_top, div_eq_inv_mul,
      rpow_one, mul_one]
    ring

rpow_add_le_add_rpow:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
theorem rpow_add_le_add_rpow {p : exprℝ} (a b : ennreal) (hp : 0 ≤ p) (hp1 : p ≤ 1) : (a + b) ^ p ≤ a ^ p + b ^ p :=
  by
  rcases hp.eq_or_lt with (rfl | hp_pos)
  · suffices (1 : ennreal) ≤ 1 + 1 by simpa using this
    norm_cast
    norm_num
  have h := rpow_add_rpow_le a b hp_pos hp1
  rw [one_div_one] at h
  repeat' rw [ennreal.rpow_one] at h
  exact (ennreal.le_rpow_one_div_iff hp_pos).mp h
#align rpow_add_le_add_rpow rpow_add_le_add_rpow

add_rpow_le_rpow_add:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
theorem add_rpow_le_rpow_add {p : exprℝ} (a b : ennreal) (hp1 : 1 ≤ p) : a ^ p + b ^ p ≤ (a + b) ^ p :=
  by
  have hp_pos : 0 < p := by positivity
  by_cases h_top : a + b = «expr⊤»
  · rw [← @ennreal.rpow_eq_top_iff_of_pos (a + b) p hp_pos] at h_top
    rw [h_top]
    exact le_top
  obtain ⟨ha_top, hb_top⟩ := add_ne_top.mp h_top
  lift a to nnreal using ha_top
  lift b to nnreal using hb_top
  simpa [← ennreal.coe_rpow_of_nonneg _ hp_pos.le] using ENNReal.coe_le_coe.2 (nnreal.add_rpow_le_rpow_add a b hp1)

add_rpow_le_one_of_add_le_one:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
private theorem add_rpow_le_one_of_add_le_one {p : exprℝ} (a b : nnreal) (hab : a + b ≤ 1) (hp1 : 1 ≤ p) :
    a ^ p + b ^ p ≤ 1 :=
  by
  have h_le_one : ∀ x : nnreal, x ≤ 1 → x ^ p ≤ x := fun x hx => rpow_le_self_of_le_one hx hp1
  have ha : a ≤ 1 := (self_le_add_right a b).trans hab
  have hb : b ≤ 1 := (self_le_add_left b a).trans hab
  exact (add_le_add (h_le_one a ha) (h_le_one b hb)).trans hab
#align add_rpow_le_one_of_add_le_one add_rpow_le_one_of_add_le_one
